> weex 的 image 组件 :src="[img?img:error.jpg]" src 属性不支持三元表达式 ，当img 有值时，图片组件显示不出来

支持的，至少我用的0.18版本是支持的。
这种没理由做不到支持，查查自身原因吧，绝大概率是自己问题

:src="Cond ? 'img1' : 'img2' "。
你看看你传的是 图片地址 还是 一个引用？图片地址要用单引号包起来
去掉[]号可以了，谢谢了
Same problem. But no suggestions\issues mentiond in Weex DOC.

> indicator

直接设置一下属性看看效果咯...
我看他0.26.0版本修改的特征不是写的支持64位arm吗

> 我看他0.26.0版本修改的特征不是写的支持64位arm吗

太多BUG了，部分手机插件启动白屏。
error_code: -1001, degradeToH5|createInstance fail|wx_create_instance_error isJSFrameworkInit==false reInitCount == 1

> 
> 
> > 我看他0.26.0版本修改的特征不是写的支持64位arm吗
> 
> 太多BUG了，部分手机插件启动白屏。
> error_code: -1001, degradeToH5|createInstance fail|wx_create_instance_error isJSFrameworkInit==false reInitCount == 1

这个错应该就是库没对应上，我这边也马上要发布Google play呢，之前在ERos上写的，没有64位库，就想转到这个上面算了，没想到weex也存在这个问题，这怎么办 啊

可以试试编译0.24.0的版本，看下能不能搞出个64位版本，或者最新源码拉下来自己编译。有结果分享一个。
好的
Master branch support 64 bit, you can build from master branch.
你是怎么升级到0.26.0的我这边升级报错

> 你是怎么升级到0.26.0的我这边升级报错

报啥错？weex新旧版本api有变化，不兼容。

> 
> 
> > 你是怎么升级到0.26.0的我这边升级报错
> 
> 报啥错？weex新旧版本api有变化，不兼容。

WXDomObject 这个找不到了，  WXSDKEngine.switchDebugModel(true, debug_url);也找不到了，IWXDebugProxy这个也找不到了。我把他们都去掉报res=-113错误了又 ，能不能加个QQ：1053419668

> 
> 
> > 你是怎么升级到0.26.0的我这边升级报错
> 
> 报啥错？weex新旧版本api有变化，不兼容。

可以了。升级了weex 重新创建的项目，你那边什么手机白屏
我拉新源码替换，0.24报了个cmake的c++空指针的异常，编译不过，0.26编译过但是weex一直报错：error_code: -1001, degradeToH5|createInstance fail|wx_create_instance_error isJSFrameworkInit==false reInitCount == 1

> 我拉新源码替换，0.24报了个cmake的c++空指针的异常，编译不过，0.26编译过但是weex一直报错：error_code: -1001, degradeToH5|createInstance fail|wx_create_instance_error isJSFrameworkInit==false reInitCount == 1

我也是这个错误，插件打不开。

> > > 你是怎么升级到0.26.0的我这边升级报错
> > 
> > 
> > 报啥错？weex新旧版本api有变化，不兼容。
> 
> 可以了。升级了weex 重新创建的项目，你那边什么手机白屏

低端机，32位cpu

> > 我拉新源码替换，0.24报了个cmake的c++空指针的异常，编译不过，0.26编译过但是weex一直报错：error_code: -1001, degradeToH5|createInstance fail|wx_create_instance_error isJSFrameworkInit==false reInitCount == 1
> 
> 我也是这个错误，插件打不开。

这种错误抛出来，无从下手，不知道哪里的问题，怎么解决

史前棘手的问题，我怕是要成背锅侠了。唉。

我重新升级了 weex-toolkit 重新创建项目，加上64位的包了，运行没问题，在64位手机也可以运行，只试了个华为和三星的可以运行正常的

你是根绝doc的唯一步骤，用toolkit创建的demo项目，然后在gradle里依赖weexsdk，编译跑起来的吗？
我觉得实际开发情况大部分是，自家项目+ copy weexsdk源码（有bug自己可以部分修复/自定义扩展能力强）。在这种项目结构下，已经实行了多次替换升级。0.1=》0.18没问题，0.18=〉0.24/0.26就会遇到上面提到的两种问题。

是的，我就是从0.16.0=》0.26.0 升级失败所以重新装的工具重新创建的项目

这种方式感觉比较片面，讲道理不应该和项目结构挂钩。况且混合开发不一定只用weex。比如要加入flutter的话，原生项目还要依赖flutter的环境。flutter官方是有提供了其他引入方式的文档。而不需要你必须新疆一个flutter项目

Android啊

> “0.16.0=》0.26.0” 和 “升级失败所以重新装”，这两种操作有什么不一样吗？你们是Android还是IOS啊

aos和ios差不多。第一种升级方式是copy sdk源码+依赖文件，手动替换升级。第二种是根据一个非官方维护的cli工具，生成一个“weex”的项目结构，然后更改里面的sdk依赖版本

> aos和ios差不多。第一种升级方式是copy sdk源码+依赖文件，手动替换升级。第二种是根据一个非官方维护的cli工具，生成一个“weex”的项目结构，然后更改里面的sdk依赖版本

Generated by :no_entry_sign: dangerJS against cbb8af1a41520a4fbbc763c62f535e1cc89ca9ac

> @zsmjhtn
> Yes, i' m sure. if i post the `renderByUrl` method delay in less than about 1000ms in my situation, error occured. the template project generated by the CLI works fine because it has a splash sceen with delay

After review my code. My problem is none of business with delay. We have two tactics:
1.FromLocal: Just like official demo, render byte[] during the delay of Container. 
2.FromServer: Rendering  byte[]  after invoke OKHttp callback successful.
Both ways hold varying degrees of time delay, for WEEXEngine finish  initialization byself。

> ok, here is my workaround for someone meeting the same issue.
> 
> ```
>         if (WXSDKEngine.isInitialized()) {
>             Log.d(TAG, "init-->1");
>             mWXSDKInstance.renderByUrl(pageName, mUri.toString(), null, null, WXRenderStrategy.APPEND_ASYNC);
>         } else {
>             Log.d(TAG, "init-->2");
>             Handler handler = new Handler();
>             final long[] delayed = new long[1];
>             delayed[0] = 100;
>             handler.postDelayed(new Runnable() {
>                 @Override
>                 public void run() {
>                     if (WXSDKEngine.isInitialized()) {
>                         Log.d(TAG, "init-->3:" +  delayed[0]);
>                         mWXSDKInstance.renderByUrl(pageName, mUri.toString(), null, null, WXRenderStrategy.APPEND_ASYNC);
>                     } else {
>                         delayed[0] += 100;
>                         handler.postDelayed(this, 100);
>                     }
>                 }
>             }, 100);
>         }
> ```

感谢你的反馈，Weex目前是隶属于Apache Software Foundation的项目，因此在Gtihub渠道我们鼓励使用英文反馈问题。下面我将使用Google Trasnlate将你的问题翻译成英语，并以英语回答。

> Question Description: [Android] webview reference H5 map can not be bit

According to [our document](https://weex.apache.org/docs/components/web.html#summary), webview is only for degraded scenario, you should not use webview in normal user case.
> `<web>` is only used as a degraded unconventional scenario and is not recommended for a large number of normal Weex pages.

So, this problem won't be fixed.
Try to compile source code in master branch with ndk 18, thanks.

感谢你的反馈，Weex目前是隶属于Apache Software Foundation的项目，因此在Gtihub渠道我们鼓励使用英文反馈问题。下面我将使用Google Trasnlate将你的问题翻译成英语，并以英语回答。

> Question Description: Can the font type of the weex Android app be the same as the font type of the phone?

First of all, there is no font called system font. If you don't specify a font-family, the fallback/default rule of font is undefined behavior.

So, specify a [font-family](https://weex.apache.org/docs/styles/text-styles.html#font-family) will make your life easier.

Currently, I can't give you a timeline about supporting `x86-64` as most of users run Apps with `armv8-64` phone instead of `x86-64`.

The main problem here is compiling [JSC](https://github.com/alibaba/weex_js_engine/tree/bridge_branch_mergeTimer) (a dependency of Weex) for x86-64 ABI. So far, no progress. You're welcomed to help us solve the problem.

感谢你的反馈，Weex目前是隶属于Apache Software Foundation的项目，因此在Gtihub渠道我们鼓励使用英文反馈问题。下面我将使用Google Trasnlate将你的问题翻译成英语，并以英语回答。

> Question Description: 0.20 version of windows packaging and mac packaging found apk size is inconsistent! What are the reasons for us?

I can't tell you what happened exactly as I am not a committer of NDK, but generally speaking, this problem is caused by stripping. As you can see, the size of many shared libraries are different, not only Weex. Change `/armeabi-v7a/.so` to `/armeabi-v7a/*.so` will give you what you want.

Get IMEI of user's phone.

As you might observed, `WXEnvironment.getDevId()` is always be invoked no matter you specify `android:name="android.permission.READ_PHONE_STATE`  or not since very early version of Weex. In some phone, calling `getSystemService(Context.TELEPHONY_SERVICE)).getDeviceId()` in code without corresponding `AndroidManifest` will cause crash. I just updated the Manifest to prevent possible crash.

https://github.com/apache/incubator-weex/blob/24a30b31e759343668cfe6b8f3de264dd3f586fe/android/sdk/src/main/java/com/taobao/weex/WXEnvironment.java#L404-L405

You're welcomed to give a PR. Please remember that in Apache Community, the relationship between users and committers are not employer and employee.  Participant is always encouraged and you can be Apache committer if you make enough contribution.
The log is pretty straight-forward, there is an undefined variable called `window` in your JS file.

`com.taobao.weex.devtools.inspector.network.NetworkEvent` is imported from `weex_inspection` for debugging purpose. Currently, weex_inspection is not a part of Apache Weex, so you should either remove the dependency or ask question in their [repo](https://github.com/weexteam/android-devtools-for-Apache-Weex)

```
JavaScriptCore's Path is /data/app/com.hellotalk-DLJZ9th0DAMmVtmO8JE5Iw==/split_config.arm64_v8a.apk!/lib/arm64-v8a/libJavaScriptCore.so but file does not exist
```

The `CSSNode` is removed for historical Facebook additional patten reason, read [document](https://weex.apache.org/guide/extend/extend-android.html#component-extension-adaptation) to find out the behaviour.

If this could solve your problem, you can update the documentation of Weex to help others.

The `:is` property is equal with `v-bind:is` which takes a js variable as its value, not the string literal of component name.

Remove the `:` or binding it with a js variable can solve it.

```html
<component
  is="lm-list-row-test"
  list_data="rowdata">
</component>
```
please use https://weex.apache.org/zh/docs/modules/console-log.html#switchloglevel
